title: Animal Testing Debates
description: A fast breakdown of Animal Testing Debates for builders.

hook.text: Over 100 million animals are used in research each year. Without them, most modern medicines wouldn't exist.

buildup.text: Animal testing helped develop insulin, antibiotics, vaccines, and surgical techniques that save millions of lives.

discovery.text: The 3Rs framework guides ethical research: Replace animals when possible, Reduce numbers, Refine to minimize suffering.
